description: An easy, delicious and flavorful no cook dinner for the summer!
name: 10 Minute Curried Chickpea Tofu Lettuce Wraps
recipeIngredient: 1 (15 oz) can chickpeas, drained and rinsed
1/2 cup red grapes, cut in half
1/4 cup + 1 tablespoon mayo, I used vegan mayo
Butter lettuce or romaine lettuce, anything that will give you a good cup

recipeInstructions.text: Add the chickpeas to a large bowl and mash them roughly with a potato masher. Use your hands to crumble to tofu into the bowl and then add all the other ingredients. Stir until combined.
Separate the lettuce cups and fill each one with desired amount of filling. Enjoy!
